data.title: Bill Murray Finds Love With 'Milkshake' Singer Kelis
data.meta_description: An unlikely relationship has struck up between Bill Murray and singer Kelis, despite an almost 30-year age gap.
data.text:
An unlikely relationship has struck up between Bill Murray and singer Kelis, despite an almost 30-year age gap.

The pair have reportedly been 'getting close for a while' as Bill was spotted at numerous Kelis shows, including her latest in London, which Bill reportedly watched 'from the side of the stage' according to The U.S. Sun.

Today's top videos

Bill, 72, and Kelis, 43, first bonded over their relatively recent losses, as Bill mourned the loss of his ex-wife, Jennifer Butler who he split from in 2008 and died unexpectedly in 2021.

Kelis' husband, Mike Mora, with whom she shares two kids, passed last year aged only 37 after a six-month battle with stomach cancer.

An insider told The Sun U.S. that the couple first met up in the U.S. before, which got people talking and are now both in London, as Kelis is performing and Bill is filming for the latest adaptation of the Ghostbusters franchise.

The insider told The Sun U.S.: 'Whatever it is that has brought them together, and however unlikely it seems, they are both single and are having fun despite the fairly big age gap.'

They both have kids of their own from previous relationships, with Bill fathering six kids, four of whom he shared with his late ex-wife, Jennifer - Caleb, aged 30, Jackson, 27, Cooper, 26, and 22-year-old Lincoln.

Kelis had her first child, Knight, with then-husband, Nas in July 2009 and went on to have two more Shephard, eight and Galilee, two, with her late spouse Mike.

Kelis' late husband revealed he was battling stomach cancer in September 2021, having been diagnosed a year previous and was given 18-months left to live.

The singer's representatives asked for Kelis' privacy to be respected during the difficult time, as she and her to children came to terms with the difficult loss.

Bill Murray's married Jennifer Butler in 1997 and went on to share an 11-year marriage. Jennifer sadly passed away in 2021 and her cause of death was never revealed.
